issue.title: segfault with __repr__ of empty Field
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-623](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-623). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The below code will cause a segfault

```Java
from pyarrow import Field

f = Field()
print(repr(f))
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-623?focusedCommentId=15907884) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 374
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/374>
